source.sqlReaderQuery: select table_schema, table_name from information_schema.tables where table_type = 'base table' and table_schema = 'Purchasing'

scripts.text:
set @condition =  'CAST(IngestDatetime AS DATE) < DATEADD(day, -7, Getdate())'

set @InsertQuery = 'Insert into dbo.DeleteLog ([Table Name], [Delete Table pk], [Complete Date]) select '''+@tablename+''' as [Table Name], Skey, Getdate() as [Complete Date] from '+@tablename+' where '+@condition
set @DelQuery = 'delete from ' + @tablename + ' where '+ @condition

EXECUTE sp_executesql @InsertQuery
EXECUTE sp_executesql @DelQuery
insert into dbo.MasterTab ([Pipline Name], [Complete Date]) values('OLTP2ODS',  Getdate())

properties.description:
[[Supplier Key]
      ,[WWI Supplier ID]
      ,[Supplier]
      ,[Category]
      ,[Primary Contact]
      ,[Supplier Reference]
      ,[Payment Days]
      ,[Postal Code]
      ,[Valid From]
      ,[Valid To]
      ,[Lineage Key]

scriptLines: join2 derive({Supplier Key} = toInteger({Supplier Key})) ~> derivedColumn1
select1, select4 lookup(WWISupplierID == {sinked WWI Supplier ID},
lookup1 filter(!isNull({sinked WWI Supplier ID}) && {sinked Active} == 1 && {Valid From} > {sinked Valid From}) ~> ExistingRows

properties.description:
[[Purchase Key]
      ,[Date Key]
      ,[Supplier Key]
      ,[Stock Item Key]
      ,[WWI Purchase Order ID]
      ,[Ordered Outers]
      ,[Ordered Quantity]
      ,[Received Outers]
      ,[Package]
      ,[Is Order Finalized]
      ,[Lineage Key]

scriptLines: filter1, select3 join(DimensionSupplier@{WWI Supplier ID} == select3@{WWI Supplier ID},
surrogateKey1, IntegrationPurchaseStaging join(StockItemID == {WWI Stock Item ID},
IntegrationStockItemStaging keyGenerate(output({Stock Item Staging Key} as long),

[[Stock Item Staging Key]

      ,[Size]

      ,[Quantity Per Outer]
      ,[Is Chiller Stock]

      ,[Unit Price]

      ,[Photo]
      ,[Valid From]

,[IngestDatetime]

scriptLines: StockItems keyGenerate(output({Stock Item Staging Key} as long),
